title: Autodoll wa Kuchita Sekai de Yume wo Miru - Novel Updates
author: Hazuki Sou   葉月双
description:
This is a tale of a destroyed world.

An amnesiac girl who awakened from suspended animation, and the female Autodoll who rescued her.

The autodoll who uses an underground library as her base camp for “world exploration” said to the girl,

——“Will you be my friend?”

Two girls who have nowhere to go.  What is the truth of the world that they will discover……?>
